title: Start or Sit (NFC)! Eagles RBs? Thielen? Evans? (10/29 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Hey, A.J. Green: TURN AROUND!!! What was that all about? We start with a recap of Packers-Cardinals and wonder which Packers RB has more dynasty value. Then we'll discuss the Week 8 replacement RBs (10:40). Do we still have confidence in Chuba Hubbard? Darrel Williams? Khalil Herbert? Who else? ... News and notes (16:00) and Beat the Waiver Wire (21:00), plus the Startometer (27:30) for Giants-Chiefs, Eagles-Lions and 49ers-Bears ... Start or Sit for Bucs-Saints (33:00), Cowboys-Vikings (41:00), Giants-Chiefs (47:30), Panthers-Falcons (53:00), Eagles-Lions (1:02:50) and 49ers-Bears (1:08:50) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @ctowerscbs, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/fantasyfootballtoday
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/
Sign up for the FFT newsletter https://www.cbssports.com/newsletter
You can listen to Fantasy Football Today on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast."
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:title: Start or Sit (NFC)! Eagles RBs? Thielen? Evans? (10/29 Fantasy Football Podcast)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: First of all, we discuss A.J. Green and the Cardinals and Packers. Then it's on to the starts and sits with replacement RBs, Mike Evans and his tough matchup, T.J. Hockenson's outlook and much more
